name: Glitcher (Valentin Liebaert)
description:
GLITCHERZ is a 1 vs 1 couch platform fighting game. Play as one of our mini glitcherZ  and get ready to fight in a merciless combat. Your goal: get your opponent out of the level by making the tiles unstable with your projectiles, and be the last one alive.

This game is playable with mouse and keyboard but we strongly recommend using XBox controllers for a better experienZ
